ch0154_00_kikuno/0101_0701_01_10:
Ahaha! Hello! You look as energetic as
always, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0154_00_kikuno/0101_0701_02_10:
Go on! Exciting adventures are out there waiting
for you and your partner Pokémon!
ch0154_00_kikuno/0601_0701_01_10:
Pokémon are like our family, and we Trainers
are like the parents and children of our partner
Pokémon.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0601_0701_02_10:
We teach each other, learn from each other, and
help each other throughout our lives.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0601_0701_03_10:
That bond between us is what makes us strong...
That’s what it means to be a sync pair.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0602_0701_01_10:
Sometimes the outcome of a Pokémon battle can
be swayed by mere luck.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0602_0701_02_10:
But if you take the time to calm your mind and
fully prepare before a battle...
ch0154_00_kikuno/0602_0701_03_10:
You can at least avoid losing due to your own
slip-ups or lack of foresight.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0603_0701_01_10:
A vast space called the Underground lies beneath
the Sinnoh region.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0603_0701_02_10:
If you like exploring, I highly recommend it. You
can find rare fossils and other things down there.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0603_0701_03_10:
You can even make your own Secret Base, too!
Ahaha! Doesn’t that sound exciting?
ch0154_00_kikuno/0604_0701_01_10:
Trainers and Pokémon may not understand each
other’s speech, but they can definitely come to
understand each other’s hearts and minds.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0604_0701_02_10:
Once you’ve made a connection like that, it’s
easier to work together during battles.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0604_0701_03_10:
You might even say that battles are the testing
grounds for the bonds between Trainers and their
partner Pokémon.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0605_0701_01_10:
I can tell you raise your Pokémon like they’re part
of your family, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0154_00_kikuno/0605_0701_02_10:
All the strongest Trainers I’ve met have taken good
care of their Pokémon.
ch0154_00_kikuno/0605_0701_03_10: I’m sure you’ll become a strong sync pair.
ch0154_00_kikuno/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve got a present for you, dear child.
ch0154_00_kikuno/1701_0701_02_10: Will you do this old lady the honor of taking it?
ch0154_00_kikuno/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m sure that gift will be of use to you when you
really need it.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2501_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m with you, dear child, I find myself
wanting to try harder in life.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2501_0701_02_10:
Even after becoming an Elite Four member, you
make me believe that there are still greater
heights to strive for—even at my age.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2501_0701_03_10: I count myself truly lucky to have met you.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2501_0702_01_10:
Whenever I’m in a sticky spot in battle, I picture
your face, dear child.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2501_0702_02_10:
Thinking of you trying your best always gives me
a boost of courage.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2501_0702_03_10:
Not only that...this old lady isn’t quite ready to
acknowledge that you’ve surpassed her!
ch0154_00_kikuno/2511_0701_01_10: To you, I’m an old lady.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2511_0701_02_10:
But still, you approach me as an equal and come
at me with everything you’ve got.
ch0154_00_kikuno/2511_0701_03_10:
That makes me incredibly happy. I can’t thank
you enough!
ch0154_00_kikuno/2511_0702_01_10:
I hope you’ll always continue to face me on the
same level!
ch0154_00_kikuno/2511_0702_02_10:
As long as you challenge me head on, without
holding anything back...
ch0154_00_kikuno/2511_0702_03_10:
this old lady will keep trying her best—and with a
smile on her face, too!
ch0154_00_kikuno/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning, dear!
I couldn’t hear you! You should always greet your
friends and Pokémon with vim and vigor!
ch0154_00_kikuno/3003_0701_01_10:
You may not be able to see them, but Pokémon
are hiding all around us—even right under
our feet!
ch0154_00_kikuno/3005_0701_01_10:
If you ever get that lonely feeling at night, just
remember—you’re never alone when your partner
Pokémon is by your side. Isn’t that reassuring?
